title: Update regarding Vitality Pharma
story_body:
Vitality Pharma (VIT) has announced the appointment of Emily Chen as Director of Marketing, effective immediately. Chen, who joins Vitality Pharma from a similar role at a pharmaceutical industry peer, will oversee the company's marketing strategy and initiatives.

Separately, Vitality Pharma has launched a new website, available at vitalitypharma.com, which provides updated information on the company's product pipeline, research and development initiatives, and corporate governance practices.

In its latest Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) update, Vitality Pharma reported that it has reduced its greenhouse gas emissions by 2% year-over-year, in line with the company's previously announced sustainability goals. The company also reported that it has maintained its commitment to diversity and inclusion, with 45% of its workforce identifying as female and 30% identifying as members of underrepresented minority groups.

These updates were disclosed in a routine filing with the relevant regulatory authorities at 08:00 EST on Tuesday, March 7, 2023.
